verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of David. A Song.) Let God <S%H430><s%> arise, <S%H6965><s%> let His enemies <S%H340><s%> be scattered; <S%H6327><s%> And let those who hate <S%H8130><s%> Him flee <S%H5127><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Him.

As smoke <S%H6227><s%> is driven <S%H5086><s%> away, <S%H5086><s%> [so] drive <S%H5086><s%> [them] away; <S%H5086><s%> As wax <S%H1749><s%> melts <S%H4549><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the fire, <S%H784><s%> [So] let the wicked <S%H7563><s%> perish before <S%H6><s%> <S%H4480><s%> God. <S%H6440><s%>
But let the righteous <S%H6662><s%> be glad; <S%H8055><s%> let them exult <S%H5970><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> God; <S%H430><s%> Yes, let them rejoice <S%H7797><s%> with gladness. <S%H8057><s%>

Sing <S%H7891><s%> to God, <S%H430><s%> sing <S%H2167><s%> praises <S%H2167><s%> to His name; <S%H8034><s%> Lift <S%H5549><s%> up [a song] for Him who rides <S%H7392><s%> through the deserts, <S%H6160><s%> Whose name <S%H8034><s%> is the Lord, <S%H3050><s%> and exult <S%H5937><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Him.
A father of the fatherless <S%H1><s%> and a judge <S%H3490><s%> for the widows, <S%H1781><s%> Is God <S%H490><s%> in His holy <S%H430><s%> habitation. <S%H6944><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> makes <S%H3427><s%> a home <S%H1004><s%> for the lonely; <S%H3173><s%> He leads <S%H3318><s%> out the prisoners <S%H615><s%> into prosperity, <S%H3574><s%> Only <S%H389><s%> the rebellious <S%H5637><s%> dwell <S%H7931><s%> in a parched <S%H6707><s%> land. <S%H6707><s%>

O God, <S%H430><s%> when Thou didst go <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Thy people, <S%H5971><s%> When Thou didst march <S%H6805><s%> through the wilderness, <S%H3452><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

The earth <S%H776><s%> quaked; <S%H7493><s%> The heavens <S%H8064><s%> also <S%H637><s%> dropped <S%H5197><s%> [rain] at the presence <S%H6440><s%> of God; <S%H430><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%> itself <S%H2088><s%> [quaked] at the presence <S%H6440><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Thou didst shed <S%H5130><s%> abroad <S%H5130><s%> a plentiful <S%H5071><s%> rain, <S%H1653><s%> O God; <S%H430><s%> Thou didst confirm <S%H3559><s%> Thine inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> when it was parched. <S%H3811><s%>
Thy creatures <S%H9130><s%> settled <S%H3427><s%> in it; Thou didst provide <S%H3559><s%> in Thy goodness <S%H9186><s%> for the poor, <S%H6041><s%> O God. <S%H430><s%>
The Lord <S%H136><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> the command; <S%H561><s%> The women who proclaim <S%H1319><s%> the [good] tidings <S%H1319><s%> are a great <S%H7227><s%> host: <S%H6635><s%>

"Kings <S%H4428><s%> of armies <S%H6635><s%> flee, <S%H5074><s%> they flee, <S%H5074><s%> And she who <S%H9317><s%> remains <S%H9317><s%> at home <S%H1004><s%> will divide <S%H2505><s%> the spoil! <S%H7998><s%>"

When <S%H518><s%> you lie <S%H7901><s%> down <S%H7901><s%> among <S%H996><s%> the sheepfolds, <S%H9630><s%> [You are like] the wings <S%H3671><s%> of a dove <S%H3123><s%> covered <S%H2645><s%> with silver, <S%H3701><s%> And its pinions <S%H84><s%> with glistening <S%H3422><s%> gold. <S%H2742><s%>
When the Almighty <S%H7706><s%> scattered <S%H6566><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> there, It was snowing <S%H7949><s%> in Zalmon. <S%H6756><s%>

A mountain <S%H2022><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> is the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Bashan; <S%H1316><s%> A mountain <S%H2022><s%> [of many] peaks <S%H1386><s%> is the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Bashan. <S%H1316><s%>

Why <S%H4100><s%> do you look <S%H7520><s%> with envy, <S%H7520><s%> O mountains <S%H2022><s%> with [many] peaks, <S%H1386><s%> At the mountain <S%H2022><s%> which God <S%H430><s%> has desired <S%H2530><s%> for His abode <S%H3427><s%>? Surely, <S%H637><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will dwell <S%H7931><s%> [there] forever. <S%H5331><s%>

The chariots <S%H7393><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> are myriads, <S%H7239><s%> thousands <S%H8136><s%> upon thousands; <S%H505><s%> The Lord <S%H136><s%> is among them [as at] Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> in holiness. <S%H6944><s%>

Thou hast ascended <S%H5927><s%> on high, <S%H4791><s%> Thou hast led <S%H7617><s%> captive <S%H7617><s%> [Thy] captives; <S%H7628><s%> Thou hast received <S%H3947><s%> gifts <S%H4979><s%> among men, <S%H120><s%> Even [among] the rebellious <S%H5637><s%> also, <S%H637><s%> that the Lord <S%H3050><s%> God <S%H430><s%> may dwell <S%H7931><s%> [there.]
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the Lord, <S%H136><s%> who daily <S%H3117><s%> bears <S%H6006><s%> our burden, <S%H6006><s%> The God <S%H410><s%> [who] is our salvation. <S%H3444><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
God <S%H410><s%> is to us a God <S%H410><s%> of deliverances; <S%H4190><s%> And to God <S%H3068><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> belong escapes <S%H8444><s%> from death. <S%H4194><s%>

Surely <S%H389><s%> God <S%H430><s%> will shatter <S%H4272><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%> of His enemies, <S%H340><s%> The hairy <S%H8181><s%> crown <S%H6936><s%> of him who goes <S%H1980><s%> on in his guilty <S%H817><s%> deeds. <S%H817><s%>

The Lord <S%H136><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "I will bring <S%H7725><s%> [them] back <S%H7725><s%> from Bashan. <S%H1316><s%> I will bring <S%H7725><s%> [them] back <S%H7725><s%> from the depths <S%H4688><s%> of the sea; <S%H3220><s%>

That your foot <S%H7272><s%> may shatter <S%H4272><s%> [them] in blood, <S%H1818><s%> The tongue <S%H3956><s%> of your dogs <S%H3611><s%> [may have] its portion <S%H4521><s%> from [your] enemies. <S%H340><s%> "
They have seen <S%H7200><s%> Thy procession, <S%H1979><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> The procession <S%H1979><s%> of my God, <S%H410><s%> my King, <S%H4428><s%> into the sanctuary. <S%H6944><s%>

The singers <S%H7891><s%> went <S%H6923><s%> on, the musicians <S%H5059><s%> after <S%H310><s%> [them], In the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the maidens <S%H5959><s%> beating <S%H8608><s%> tambourines. <S%H8608><s%>
Bless <S%H1288><s%> God <S%H430><s%> in the congregations, <S%H4721><s%> [Even] the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> [you who are] of the fountain <S%H4726><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

There <S%H8033><s%> is Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> the youngest, <S%H6810><s%> ruling <S%H7287><s%> them, The princes <S%H8269><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> [in] their throng, <S%H7277><s%> The princes <S%H8269><s%> of Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Naphtali. <S%H5321><s%>

Your God <S%H430><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> your strength; <S%H5797><s%> Show <S%H5810><s%> Thyself strong, <S%H5810><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> who <S%H2098><s%> hast acted <S%H6466><s%> on our behalf.
Because <S%H4480><s%> of Thy temple <S%H1964><s%> at Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> Kings <S%H4428><s%> will bring <S%H2986><s%> gifts <S%H7862><s%> to Thee.

Rebuke <S%H1605><s%> the beasts <S%H9130><s%> in the reeds, <S%H7070><s%> The herd <S%H5712><s%> of bulls <S%H47><s%> with the calves <S%H5695><s%> of the peoples, <S%H5971><s%> Trampling <S%H7511><s%> under foot <S%H7511><s%> the pieces <S%H7518><s%> of silver; <S%H3701><s%> He has scattered <S%H967><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> who delight <S%H2654><s%> in war. <S%H7128><s%>
Envoys <S%H2831><s%> will come <S%H857><s%> out of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%> will quickly <S%H7323><s%> stretch <S%H7323><s%> out her hands <S%H3027><s%> to God. <S%H430><s%>
Sing <S%H7891><s%> to God, <S%H430><s%> O kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the earth; <S%H776><s%> Sing <S%H2167><s%> praises <S%H2167><s%> to the Lord, <S%H136><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

To Him who rides <S%H7392><s%> upon the highest <S%H8064><s%> heavens, <S%H8064><s%> which are from ancient <S%H6924><s%> times; <S%H6924><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> He speaks <S%H5414><s%> forth <S%H5414><s%> with His voice, <S%H6963><s%> a mighty <S%H5797><s%> voice. <S%H6963><s%>
Ascribe <S%H5414><s%> strength <S%H5797><s%> to God; <S%H430><s%> His majesty <S%H1346><s%> is over <S%H5921><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> And His strength <S%H5797><s%> is in the skies. <S%H7834><s%>

O God, <S%H430><s%> [Thou art] awesome <S%H3372><s%> from Thy sanctuary. <S%H4720><s%> The God <S%H410><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> Himself <S%H1931><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> strength <S%H5797><s%> and power <S%H8592><s%> to the people. <S%H5971><s%> Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be God! <S%H430><s%>
